00022 /**
00023  * @file   DataTransform.h
00024  * @author Chuck Sugnet
00025  * @date   Wed Oct  7 15:44:24 PDT 2009
00026  *
00027  * @brief Base class for objects that will manipulate data and produce a new
00028  *        set. For example statistics might be calculated, background might be
00029  *        subtracted, normalization might be performed, or data might be reordered.
00030  */
00031 #ifndef _DATATRANSFORM_H_
00032 #define _DATATRANSFORM_H_
00033 
00034 //
00035 #include "chipstream/DataStore.h"
00036 #include "chipstream/PsBoard.h"
00037 //
00038 
00039 
00040 /**
00041  * Base class for objects that will manipulate data and produce a new set. For
00042  * example statistics might be calculated, background might be subtracted,
00043  * normalization might be performed, or data might be reordered.
00044  */
00045 class DataTransform {
00046 
00047 public:
00048 
00049   /** Virtual destructor for a virtual class. */
00050   virtual ~DataTransform() {}
00051 
00052   /** 
00053    * Core API. Take in a blackboard, a data store and output an updated blackboard and
00054    * possibly modified data store.
00055    * 
00056    * @param board Blackboard state input, to be updated as dictated by transform
00057    * @param in    Intensity level data to be transformed
00058    * @param out   Any intensity data post transform
00059    */
00060   virtual bool transformData(PsBoard &board, const DataStore &in, DataStore &out) = 0;
00061 
00062   /** 
00063    * Get a unique identifier for this data transform.
00064    * 
00065    * @return string that identifies the type of transform
00066    */
00067   virtual std::string getName() = 0;
00068 }; 
00069 
00070 #endif /* DATATRANSFORM_H */
